name: Air New Zealand 777-319ER "The Hobbit" [ZK-OKP] Takeoff From LAX ᴴᴰ
description:
Woohoo, finally caught this bird again... Sort of. Right as he lined up on the runway, my camera battery died. I took over right away with my iPhone though, so at least you get the takeoff, plus the close-up shots of the taxi that I was able to get with my camera. Hope you enjoy, nonetheless!

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
____________________________________________________

FLIGHT INFO
Airline: Air New Zealand (ANZ/NZ)
Aircraft: Boeing 777-300ER
Registration: ZK-OKP
Route: LAX-LHR
Callsign: Air New Zealand 2 Heavy
Runway used: 24L
FlightAware: http://flightaware.com/live/flight/ZKOKP
